summary: This is a service request ticket (EFTA00125622) from the Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated September 24, 2019. It documents a technical issue with installing a 'Nice Vision' system software, which fails to copy files from the C: drive root. The request is marked as a priority emergency.

events.title: Nice Vision System Installation Failure at MCC New York
events.description: A service request is logged for the FBOP MCC New York due to a failed installation of a new Nice Vision system. The software installation error states 'Failed to copy files from the root of C:'.

locations: FBOP MCC New York MS0109 (130164.001) Main Location NEW YORK, NY 10007
FBOP MCC New York MS0109 (130104.001) NEW YORK, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a service request ticket (EFTA00125622) from the Federal Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The request, dated September 24, 2019, is for a failed software installation of a 'Nice Vision' system, marked as a priority emergency.
The technical error preventing installation is: 'Failed to copy files from the root of C:'.
The document originates from a Bureau of Prisons facility in New York, NY 10007.
